attributes.action: Introduce a punitive rate of taxation on pensions greater than £100,000 p.a.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent case of Sir Fred Goodwin's pension highlights the outrageoulsy large sums being paid as pensions to former chief executives and other senior staff.
No-one needs such a large pension and such payments are an abuse of the favourable tax treatment given to pension savings. 
Where pensions exceed £100,000 p.a. there should be a special tax rate for that part of the pension that exceeds £100,000.  A tax rate of 90% might be considered appropriate.
